## Summary

Describe the change and the problem it solves.

## Type of change

- [ ] Feature (into `develop`)
- [ ] Release prep (from `release/*` into `develop`)
- [ ] Hotfix (from `hotfix/*` into `main`)
- [ ] Chore/Docs/Refactor

## Branch

- Source branch: `<!-- e.g., feature/awesome-thing -->`
- Target branch: `<!-- e.g., develop or main -->`

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch follows Git Flow naming (feature/, release/, hotfix/)
- [ ] Tests updated/added (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README or code docs)
- [ ] Version bumped for release/hotfix (if applicable)
